name: Custom Housewarming
description: We made this basket for a budding fashion jewelry designer who draws her inspiration from Beyonce.  Upon moving to a new place, a very good friend decided to surprise her with a basket of encouragement & congratulations.  So we created a couple inspirational photo collages featuring images and quotes from King Bey herself, and mounted them in fabulous rhinestone-adorned pictures frames.  Also crafted specially for the recipient, was a dream board with another image of Bey hand-embedded in the center and surrounded by motivational words and phrases.  We also included some velvet jewelry displays to help the young designer show off her unique wares.  Finally, everything was packaged together in an adorable storage basket reminding her to "Follow Your Dreams!"

name: We can also make cards ...
description: If you wish, for an additional fee, we can make a handcrafted card to include in your gift too!

name: Baby's Shower Basket
description:
Here's a custom basket designed for a baby shower for a client who had a set budget she wanted to spend.  We decided to go with a general green  baby wellness theme, and threw in some extras for Mommy-to-be to enjoy.

For baby we provided various baby bath care items from Method, and 
snacks and jarred food from Plum Organic and Earth's Harvest.

Mommy received juice from Honest Kids, Emerald Almond snack packs, Jammy Sammy sandwiches, lanolin, and Traditional Medicinal's "Mother's Milk" and "Smooth Move" teas, and Whole Foods lip balm.

Contact us to create a custom basket for your special loved one today!

name: The International Spice Rack
description:
Take your taste buds around the globe with the flavors found in the International Spice Rack, which comes packed in its own rustic crate, and complete with 2-in-1 salt & pepper grinder.  Visit places such as:

France - for Herbs de Provence
Spain - for Saffron
Sri Lanka - for Curry powder
Hawaii - for Alaea Red Sea Salt
India - for Fennel seeds
And more!

Savor the taste of traveling the world from the comfort of your own home, where the only Customs you'll have to go through are yours!

name: Get Bowled Over
description: Prepare to be bowled over by this bamboo salad bowl which comes complete with bamboo serving utensils, bottles of Bochetto oil and vinegar, and cruet.  Produce brush is also bamboo.

name: The Hand of Milk & Honey
description:
Treat over worked hands to a pampering soak in Organic Homemade's Carrot & Soy Squeaky Clean hand wash, followed up with their Apple, Carrot, & Oat Milk hand cream. 

And we didn't forget about those tootsies!  We've also included a bar of thick, creamy, all-vegetable World Market Honey soap, nail brush, and two pumice sponges!

name: Yummy-to-Be
description:
Custom basket created for Baby Shower.  Client relayed that the mother-to-be was interested in making homemade baby food, and requested we find a "Magic Baby Bullet."  So we obliged, and included healthy treats from Annie's and Earth's Best as well.  Also in the basket were nursing supplies, bottles, lanolin, and packets of Traditional Medicinal's Mother's Milk teas.

As an extra service, we also included a handmade greeting card from Spy Da Works!

Contact us to create a customized basket for your special loved one today!

name: A Taste of Europe
description:
Take your tastebuds on a tour of the UK, Spain, France, Italy, and even Sweden with this basket of delicious delectables from across the pond . . .

Basket includes: 
Petít Caprice rosé
Cascina Belvedere Risotto Mix w/ Porcini mushrooms
SoSo filor de sal hierbas (herbal salts)
Antonio Sotos sweet paprika
Nutella spread
Walkers shortbread cookies
New English Breakfast Teas
Union Jack personal mini teapot
2 French porcelain cheese plates
2 Italian stemless wine goblets

Taste 5 countries without using a passport . . . or getting that oh so gentle pat-down at airport security . . .

*Note: Due to postal restrictions, we are not allowed to ship alcohol.  We will, however, deliver within the five boroughs and parts of Long Island.

name: Ladies' Green Thumb Gift Basket
description:
Your green thumb will give this gift basket containing garden tools & treats the thumbs up . . . It features:

1 ceramic flower pot
1 pair ladies' gardening gloves
1 pkg Marigold seeds
1 box Wildflower mix
1 Plant Genie automatic plant watering device
1 set pruning clippers
1 garden themed 2x2 picture frame
3 Yummy Earth organic fruit lollipops

Give her a gift like this one . . . and she may just plant one on you!!

*Shipping is approximate, and is subject to change depending on location.  See store policy for details.

name: Movie Night Gift Basket
description:
This basket is for the movie lover in your life, even that film buff happens to be you!!  
Includes:
1 box Primetime Extra Butter microwave popcorn,
1 pkg carmel popcorn salt,
1 popcorn tub salt shaker,
1 jumbo box each of Mike & Ike, Swedish Fish, and Raisinettes,
1 tub nacho cheese spread,
1 USA Today Movie Crossword puzzle book,
 And it all comes packed in a giant-sized popcorn tub . . .

Even if just hanging out on a lazy afternoon, this tub of movie goodies will put a widescreen smile on any movie lover's face.  :D

*Shipping is approximate, and may vary with location.  See shipping policy for more details.

name: Some Like it Hot
description:
For that special someone that likes it hot: light up his or her day & taste buds with the goodies in this gift basket.  Featuring:

1) 1 package of Mexican Chipotle Chilies
2) 1 bottle of Melinda's Jalepeno ketchup
3) 1 jar of Guajillo Chili powder
4) 1 jar raspberry pepper jelly
5) 1 container Antonio Soto's Gourmet Spicy Paprika
6) 2 World Market Chipotle Chili dark chocolate

We'll bet this basket will bring a tear to your loved one's eye . . .oh yeah, and they'll probably like it too !!

*Shipping rate is approximate, and may vary based on location.  See store policy for details.

name: Mother's Day Everyday Gift Basket
description:
Make everyday Mother's Day with this gift basket designed to put her in a state of relaxation . . . Includes:
 
"A Taste of Chicken Soup for the Mother's Soul" by 
"Sweet Dreams" sleep mask
"I Love Mom" 5x7 picture frame
1 lavender bath pillow
1 lavender terry cloth hair wrap
2 Anu Essentials bath soaps
1 Anu Essentials body butter mini
1 pair each moisturizing gloves and socks
Tea by Tiffany loose tea

Shower your mom with this basket of relaxation . . . She may just finally forgive you for that time you crashed the car into the garage.

*Shipping is approximate, and is subject to change depending on location.  See store policy for details.

name: Be Fruitful & Multi-Sigh Gift Basket
description:
Make bath time fruitfully healthy and relaxing at the same time with this gift basket featuring two bars of naturally derived multigrain triple milled vegetable soap, back strap, and candle.

Basket includes:
1 bar Greenscape Organic Homemade Lettuce, Pear, & Lime nourishing soap bar
1 bar Greenscape Organic Homemade Mandarin, Grape, & Walnut exfoliating soap bar
1 2 fl oz bottle each Pomona Turkish Pomegranate Bath Wash & Body Lotion
1 Birds Nest tealight candle
1 Bath by Ricky's back strap (back-scrubber)

Enjoy the luxury of favorite fruit scented soaps without the harmful additives & preservatives.  Just don't eat the soap!!

*Shipping is approximate, and is subject to change depending on location.  See store policy for details.
